code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AddMovieForm(_ref){let{addMovie}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[image,setImage]=useState('');function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();const newMovie={title,image,likes:0};fetch('http://localhost:3001/movies',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(newMovie)}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{addMovie(data);setTitle('');setImage('');});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add movie"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title of movie",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true,style:{marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"URL de l\u2019image",value:image,onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.value),required:true,style:{marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add"})]});}
